about_the_game: This is the free demo version of Globe Games. It contains tutorials for the controls, spherical chess piece movement, and Chess Solitaire puzzle mode. The Chess Solitaire mode has five levels of difficulty and randomly generated puzzles. The demo does not feature the full game modes or online multiplayer.
